result.eng: He wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ga: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpa
result.orig: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpa
result.html: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeastaiġ uaiḋ dul i dtaiṫí ar ċultúr na hEorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.

result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.html: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.orig: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.html: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: Ṫug túr ṫeas an Lárionad Trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: Jamie was four years old, no more, no less.
result.ga: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí Séimí
result.orig: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí Séimí
result.html: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí SéimíJamie was four years old, no more, no less.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre bliana gan lá ċuige nó uaiḋ a ḃí SéimíJamie was four years old, no more, no less.
